title: Account hacked, $200 lost, account transferred to unknown region
body: Recently over the past few months, I have been noticing password reset emails being sent to me for my league account. (I'm currently writing this up from a separate account) Every time I get one, I change my password. A couple times, I have found my passwords don't actually work, and I end up swapping the password again and recovering the account with my email. I have never shared my account info with anyone and I don't even leave the computer accessible with league logged in.  Recently I added a credit card to the account for convenience for a couple of purchases, was too lazy to punch in the information twice for 2 separate charges of RP.  Saw the account was hacked and they made off with a couple hundred bucks of RP, but the problem is they used the money to purchase a transfer to another region, as when I try to log in, I get the message "Your account is currently in the process of transferring, please try again in a few minutes." When I look up the account and have friends check it, they are still able to see it in NA, so I guess the transfer hasn't gone through. I submitted a ticket, and was hoping to get some attention to the transfer aspect - Riot's FAQ sends me a link for account recovery, but I already have the account recovered with an even more secure password. I was really looking forward to using this time to play on my main account in ranked, as I have a limited amount of time off from work to play. Hoping any rioters can add some clarity to this issue. Thanks in advance.

replies.body: Since we're both pretty certain that account was compromised, your best bet is to go ahead and use that [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). Those account agents will be able to make sure your account is still safe as well as help reverse any fraudulent purchases as well.

My account was hacked then send to the Russian sever I used the account recovery form, I got my account back but it stayed in that region, when I reported back that my account was still in that region the account agents said that I need to put RP in my account to move my account back.

P.S : I cant paid in that sever IDK why.

This account I'm using is my EUW account that account has the same name and was in EUNE

I've got your old ticket pulled up right now, and I'm not entirely sure why the agent you spoke with said that. Since the account was compromised and transferred by the hacker, you should be able to reach back out to us and get that reversed as well. Shoot us another [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and explain that the account was recently hacked and transferred, and that nobody has repaired the transfer yet.
That is a simple /me command that players have figured out. Essentially it's like using a personal "emote".

Still waiting after 3 days to hear back from an agent, the loss of $200 doesn't bother me as much as the $400+ of skins on the account. Also, the account recovery people sent the automated reply email in French. {{champion:7}}
Maybe the account is in EUW or EUNE
